attributes.action: impose a law against battery farming in the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Battery chickens all around Britain are being forced to live in horrible and inhumane conditons - stifled by their own waste and crammed into tight cages the size of an A4 piece of paper with lots of other chickens. If you sign this petition then you are urging the Prime Minister to do something about this cruelty. There are other alternatives to this way of farming such as free range farming or even simply raising the chickens in barns, but battery farming is still in action, and this needs to stop. Now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
